ovdesc.p: This table indicates to the system how a "Price Type" calculation is to be performed within any given transaction in the securities module.

For example whether it is a percentage price and should be divided by 100 to obtain the correct gross amount, or where (as in the case of options) the nominal is a contract representing a given number of shares per unit (of nominal). The user may indicate this by using the "MULTIPLY.FACTOR field" eg. Where each unit of the nominal amount represents an option on 1000 shares the "MULTIPLY.FACTOR" would be 1000.

Specifies whether or not the securities are discount instruments.
In order to accrue or amortise the discount amount when a security is traded this flag must be st to "Y". This process will only be carried out for the banks own portfolios.
Values allowed are "Y" or "NO". (Mandatory Input)
For "Y" to be entered the PERCENTAGE field must be set to "Y" and the CALCULATION.METHOD field cannot be set to "PRICE".
For "NO" to be entered the CALCULATION.METHOD must be set to "PRICE".
